sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Computes the inverse hyperbolic tangent of its argument. The general syntax for its use is y = atanh(x) where x is an n-dimensional array of numerical type.

sect1.title: Internals
sect1.para: The atanh function is computed from the formula \[ \tanh^{-1}(x) = \frac{1}{2}\log\left(\frac{1+x}{1-x}\right) \] where the log (and square root) is taken in its most general sense.
